hooks.command: FILE="$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH"; EXT="${FILE##*.}"; case "$EXT" in php|blade.php) if [ -f vendor/bin/pint ]; then vendor/bin/pint "$FILE" 2>/dev/null; elif [ -f vendor/bin/php-cs-fixer ]; then vendor/bin/php-cs-fixer fix "$FILE" 2>/dev/null; elif command -v php-cs-fixer >/dev/null 2>&1; then php-cs-fixer fix "$FILE" 2>/dev/null; fi;; py) if command -v ruff >/dev/null 2>&1; then ruff format "$FILE" 2>/dev/null && ruff check --fix "$FILE" 2>/dev/null; elif command -v black >/dev/null 2>&1; then black "$FILE" 2>/dev/null; fi;; go) if command -v gofmt >/dev/null 2>&1; then gofmt -w "$FILE" 2>/dev/null; fi;; rs) if command -v rustfmt >/dev/null 2>&1; then rustfmt "$FILE" 2>/dev/null; fi;; rb) if command -v rubocop >/dev/null 2>&1; then rubocop -a "$FILE" 2>/dev/null; fi;; swift) if command -v swiftformat >/dev/null 2>&1; then swiftformat "$FILE" 2>/dev/null; fi;; kt|kts) if command -v ktlint >/dev/null 2>&1; then ktlint -F "$FILE" 2>/dev/null; fi;; dart) if command -v dart >/dev/null 2>&1; then dart format "$FILE" 2>/dev/null; fi;; *) if [ -f .prettierrc ] || [ -f .prettierrc.json ] || [ -f .prettierrc.js ] || [ -f prettier.config.js ] || [ -f prettier.config.mjs ] || [ -f prettier.config.cjs ]; then npx prettier --write "$FILE" 2>/dev/null; elif [ -f biome.json ] || [ -f biome.jsonc ]; then npx @biomejs/biome format --write "$FILE" 2>/dev/null; elif [ -f .eslintrc ] || [ -f .eslintrc.json ] || [ -f .eslintrc.js ] || [ -f eslint.config.js ] || [ -f eslint.config.mjs ] || [ -f eslint.config.cjs ]; then npx eslint --fix "$FILE" 2>/dev/null; fi;; esac; true
